lead_paragraph: Jeff Burton was the fastest qualifier yesterday for tomorrow’s Nascar Nextel Cup race at Michigan International Speedway. Burton had a top lap of 187.936 miles an hour. Elliott Sadler, hired by Evernham Motorsports to replace Jeremy Mayfield, qualified second.
